extension.summary: Live Streams
extension.description: To enable Clarkey Streams, Go into the settings, then Clarkey Streams and enable Browse and play from Clarkey Streams! You can also add your own xml file. Thus giving you a nice list with thumbnails, fanart, and media info if you like. For more info and instructions on how to use this add-on please visit the IPTV section of our website [COLOR blue]www.streamboxlive.wordpress.com[/COLOR]

extension.summary: NTV.mx
extension.description: Stream all of your favourites sports,movies and tv from NTV.mx

extension.summary: Play videos of different sports streaming sites
extension.description: Play videos of different sports streaming sites

extension.summary: Live Uk Tv
extension.description: LIVE UK TV Channels. By using This Plugin You will receive all the UK TV for FREE. For more info and instructions go to the StreamBox Live page of our website [COLOR blue]www.streamboxlive.wordpress.com[/COLOR]
extension.disclaimer: All streams are provided by FilmOn, StreamBox Live do not host any streams!

extension.summary: Stream Movies, no links
extension.description: Stream all the latest movies. With no links, just click and watch. For more info and instructions please visit the StreamBox Movies page of our website [COLOR blue]www.streamboxlive.wordpress.com[/COLOR]
extension.disclaimer: StreamBox movies does not host any files, it simply provides you a link to the file that is easily found on the web. thank you!!

extension.summary: Watch All Your Uk TV
extension.description: Watch All Your Uk TV

extension.summary: WLIPTV.com
extension.description: NTV.mx have new servers for some countries so this is an edited version of ntv to work with new accounts. Stream all of your favourites sports, movies and tv from wliptv.com For more info and instructions on how to use this add-on please visit the WLIPTV section of our website [COLOR blue]www.streamboxlive.wordpress.com[/COLOR]

extension.summary: Install MY Addons
extension.description: Download and install addons from uscclarkey. For more info please visit [COLOR blue]www.streamboxlive.wordpress.com[/COLOR]

extension.disclaimer: I have not created this add-on. But! I do have control over the listings and the channels available. I have re-skinned an already existing and working add-on. All credit has to go to kinkin, rayw1986 and twinther.

extension.summary: Media Browser Addon for XBMC.
extension.description: Navi-X is the oldest and most trusted add-on for XBMC, used by millions of people worldwide. You'll find everything from live television to your favourite movies and television shows, easily accessible.

extension.summary: Parental Controls
extension.description: A parental controls addon. Works only with sources that provide ratings such as HULU.
